_xResult.title: A Day at the Bay Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made summer dress with fun pattern
_xResult.longdesc:
A day at the bay is all you may need to wash your worries away. The sun that sparkles on the water, the heat that warms your skin, and the breeze that blows through your hair. Your heart warms with the carefree feeling the water brings. Look stellar while enjoying your time in this made to measure maxi perfect for those sunny days.

 

This sheer dress made of viscose and chiffon comes with a slip underneath. We love the ruffles that line the v-neck shape of the front and back of this dress. The spaghetti straps which tie at the top of the shoulders give this custom made maxi a touch of lightness.

 

You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
